definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: Cylinder sleeves, camshafts and piston pins can be coated with the new method.
sentences.chinese: 新塗層工藝適用於汽缸套，凸輪軸和活塞銷。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a cam shaft straightener and belongs to the field of machinery.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種凸輪軸校直機，屬機械領域。

sentences.english: A sort of chilled nodular iron camshaft was developed by adopting resin-coated sand shell mould casting process.
sentences.chinese: 開發了一種採用樹脂砂殼型鑄造的激冷球鐵凸輪軸。

sentences.english: The effect of pouring temperature on the microstructure of chilled iron camshaft was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了澆注溫度對激冷鑄鐵凸輪軸組織性能的影響。

sentences.english: This pump design operates by means of an eccentric (an off-center section) on the engine camshaft.
sentences.chinese: 這種泵是由發動機凸輪軸上的偏心輪驅動。

sentences.english: Camshaft is one of the important parts on the automobile engine.
sentences.chinese: 凸輪軸是汽車發動機的重要零件。

sentences.english: This paper describes the design method of the swinging master as the attachment in a camshaft copying lathe.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了凸輪軸車牀擺動靠模的設計方法。

sentences.english: This VVT system is suitable for high-speed automot…
sentences.chinese: 該系統適合於頂置雙凸輪軸車用高速汽油機。

sentences.english: The camshafts are hollow providing an oil passage for a better lubrication.
sentences.chinese: 凸輪軸是空心提供一個更好的潤滑一油路。

sentences.english: Camshaft from the crankshaft through the timing belt or gear or chain drive.
sentences.chinese: 凸輪軸由曲軸通過齒形帶或齒輪或鏈條驅動。

sentences.english: When you increase the rpm, however, this configuration for the camshaft does not work well.
sentences.chinese: 當您增加轉速時，但這種配置的凸輪軸不工作。

sentences.english: The manganate phosphating technology of camshaft is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹凸輪軸的磷化工藝。

sentences.english: This VVT system is suitable for high-speed automotive gasoline engines with DOHC.
sentences.chinese: 該系統適合於頂置雙凸輪軸車用高速汽油機。

sentences.english: It is a new technology in camshaft production, with a huge developing prospective.
sentences.chinese: 是新型的凸輪軸製造技術，具有廣泛的發展空間。

sentences.english: In its initial stage the change-of the camshaft is performed.
sentences.chinese: 在他的初始階段凸輪軸的轉換被執行。

definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
